nodes.text: The Foreman's Labor was a Hardcell-class interstellar transport used by the CIS Navy of the Separatist Alliance during the Clone Wars. Foreman's Labor was considered legendary for its ability to hold out under the heaviest of enemy firepower.

It participated in the First Battle of Geonosis, the battle that began the war, alongside three other Hardcell-class interstellar transports as they attempted to escape the planet Geonosis. During the escape, the transports fought against Galactic Republic starships, resulting in the destruction of one transport, the critical damaging of another, the damage to a third, and the Foreman's Labor's deflector shields receiving enemy fire. It was also equipped with six sublight engines and at least three forward laser cannons.
